answers.answer: Sorry, still waiting for mine in the mail. Going to be doing it my self. Curious, not sure what pcos stands for. Maybe if you spell it out, someone might answer you.

Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS)It is a disease some women get.These are the symptomsAbnormal, irregular, or scanty (very light or infrequent) menstrual periodsAbsent periods , usually (but not always) after having one or more normal menstrual periods during puberty (secondary amenorrhea)Weight gain, even obesityInsulin resistance and diabetesInfertilityIncreased hair growth; distribution of body hair may be in a male patternVirilization -- development of male sex characteristics in a female. This may include an increase in body hair, facial hair, a deepening of the voice, male-pattern baldness, and clitoral enlargement.Decreased breast sizeAggravation of acne

question: Any one doing or has done HCG and they have PCOS?   How was your weightloss?Did you go to a clinic or do it yourself?Thanks
title: PCOS and HCG?
